## StructureGroup.directory property

Directory name.

The directory name is the Structure Group's physical name in the target structure. The directory name is subject to the restrictions of the Windows file system. The directory name of the root Structure Group may be empty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get directory(): string | undefined;
```
